name: Mama Bird
description:
Volley Bird Vomit! Feed Your Bird Children!

Made for the 2021 GMTK Jam, 5th year baby!

Tutorial:

Click and drag the birds around and don't let the red birds touch your birds. The vomit is shot in a circular motion, don't let it do a full 360. 

The Combo system works like this

Time vomit has been in the air x Times the vomit has bounced off a wall x Number of Birds Fed

The closer you can get to getting the vomit to doing a 360 while also bouncing it off a wall and feeding a lot of birds, the better. 

Otherwise, experiment, you'll figure it out.
